amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 34 in the Congressional Record of June 20, 1995 to cut economic support funds and/or military assistance to Turkey until the State Department reports to Congress on Turkey's progress on extending political and economic rights to its Kurdish minority and lifts.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Porter amendment (A018). Mr. Callahan stated that the Porter amendment contained a limitation on a general appropriations bill and was, therefore, not currently in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
